steps.title: Start by sketching a skeleton of your dinosaur.
steps.content: Start by sketching a skeleton of your dinosaur. Draw a curved cross as shown.

steps.title: Add in 2 triangles for the beak, a circle for the head, and an oval for the crown.
steps.content: Add in 2 triangles for the beak, a circle for the head, and an oval for the crown.

steps.title: Sketch in a neck and thin body, using ovals.
steps.content: Sketch in a neck and thin body, using ovals. Add in feet and a very small tail.

steps.title: Sketch in a curved triangle for the wings and don't forget to add a hand with small fingers.
steps.content: Sketch in a curved triangle for the wings and don't forget to add a hand with small fingers.

steps.title: Outline your drawing and add in details; erase guidelines.
steps.content: Outline your drawing and add in details; erase guidelines.

steps.title: Color it up and you're done!
steps.content: Color it up and you're done! Be creative. You've just drawn your very own pterodactyl Congratulations! !
